attributes.name: businessUnitCode
attributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

attributes.name: costingType
attributes.description: Type of method used to record the material cost.

attributes.name: fulfilmentMethod
attributes.description: Methods of fulfilment, e.g. shipping, dropship, packing, etc.

attributes.name: inventoryProductId
attributes.description: The inventory product identifier in the inventory transactions.

attributes.name: locationId
attributes.description: ID of the location of the Inventory for material costing.

attributes.name: logisticsReponsibility
attributes.description: The personnel/department who is responsible for inwarding and outwarding.

attributes.name: materialId
attributes.description: ID associated with material cost.

attributes.name: otherCost1
attributes.description: The other cost related to material which includes ordering cost, carrying or holding cost, etc.

attributes.name: otherCost2
attributes.description: The other cost related to material which includes ordering cost, carrying or holding cost, etc.

attributes.name: otherCost3
attributes.description: The other cost related to material which includes ordering cost, carrying or holding cost, etc.

attributes.name: otherCost4
attributes.description: The other cost related to material which includes ordering cost, carrying or holding cost, etc.

attributes.name: otherCost5
attributes.description: The other cost related to material which includes ordering cost, carrying or holding cost, etc.

attributes.name: segment01
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment02
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment03
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment04
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: segment05
attributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

attributes.name: shelfLifeDays
attributes.description: Number of days the item will remain useable.

attributes.name: stockingUnitOfMeasure
attributes.description: Units of measure used for stocking the item.

attributes.name: totalCost
attributes.description: The overall total cost of the material.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: validFromDate
attributes.description: The date from which material cost is valid.

attributes.name: validToDate
attributes.description: The date to which material cost is valid.

attributes.name: valuationDate
attributes.description: Refers to valuation date of the material.
